attributes.title: Trump is in special needs

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: When I first open the app I had to look at this Cheetos lookin man. He obvi don’t know how spray tan work. Then the app kept glitching. An app for the president that doesn’t even work?! No way. Won’t be voting.

attributes.title: Do you not get this app
attributes.review: I was very disappointed with the quality of this app. The notifications do not send properly.

attributes.title: Take this app down

attributes.title: Laggy

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app keeps on giving me ads, every single time. And it keeps getting slow by the day. Do something about it NOW or DELETE IT NOW. Cause it USELESS.

attributes.title: Tiktok lives matter ✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: i lost my chinchilla😭
attributes.review: i downloaded this app in an attempt to find a reason not to hate the our president, but instead found out that my chinchilla is afraid of orange. as soon as i opened the app she saw the ✨cheeto ✨and ran away and we haven’t been able to find her. i hope she’s okay. you tried ✨🧚‍♀️💐now never try again✨💐
